item.title: Stuart Maconies Freakier Zone - 1960s Electronica
item.description: Stuart presents an hour playlist of pioneering electronic sounds from the 1960s including Silver Apples, Morton Subotnick and Raymond Scott.

item.title: Stuart Maconies Freak Zone - Station to Station A 30-Day Happening
item.description: Stuart finds out about Doug Aitken's Station To Station: A 30 Day Happening hosted by the Barbican Centre this summer. The music events include Terry Riley creating a new piece, New York art rockers Suicide and an 88-cymbal, 8-guitar orchestra put together by Japanese noiseniks Boredoms.

item.title: Tom Ravenscroft - Lower Dens guest mix
item.description: The Baltimore four-piece Lower Dens lead by songwriter and guitarist Jana Hunter provide this week's guest mix for Tom. Jana also co-produced their latest album Escape from Evil, the follow up to 2012's Nootropics.
